column4: I have a local network and I would like to use my ubuntu installation as a server (www, ssh etc) and I would like to access the server using a local hostname rather than the ip number. How can I accomplish this?
On how many computers do you want to be able to access it using this local hostname?
there are a few ways. Easiest is editing the /etc/hosts file
You would have to do this on both computers.
